resources.string: Instruction Text Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.

This app is designed to easily help users find anagrams, subwords, or word combinations that can be made from a set of letters. You could find an anagram of your name or other things, or use it as an aid for crosswords or games like Words With Friends(TM), or Scrabble(TM)...

To find anagrams, simply type the letters of names, or a words you are curious about. For games like Scrabble(TM) or Words With Friends(TM), just enter your letters in no specific order in the search bar and Word Sleuth will do the work for you...

Sub-words are words that can be made with the letters provided, but are not full anagrams. They have 1 or more letters left over. Finding subwords is easy with Word Sleuth. They will appear as an option in a list to view when a query is submitted, along with anagrams, and combinations, if any are found...
Word combinations are simply multiple word anagrams from a user\'s query. For example a word combination anagram for \"Word Sleuth\" is \"Slower Thud\"...

Sometimes you don\'t know all the letters for a query, such as in a crossword, or in other games with blank letters. You can substitute unknown letters with the "*" wildcard character and Word Sleuth will do the heavy lifting to find matches...
To search, enter your query in the search bar above. Click on the icon to expand. Type \"*\" for wildcards.
To search, enter your query in the search bar above. Click on the icon to expand. Type \"*\" for wildcards.
